channel.title: YakSmack
channel.description:
Get a free professional studio recording for your podcast. No registration required. Simply send an email to freehelp@comast.com

1st, Choose a male or female voice
2nd, type the words to be recorded into the body or subject of the email, please do not send attachments.

3rd download your professional recording. Why are we doing this for free? All we ask is that you link back to our site, or, allow us to include our url in the recording.
FAQ
I don't have a podcast.
That's ok, send us a link to your blog, and we will compose, publish, and syndicate a podcast about your blog.
I don't have a blog.
That's ok, send us a link to your business or personal website, we'll do the rest. We can create a podcast together over the phone.
Why would I want to do that?
Podcasting is a great way to create audio learning tools, as well as, promote products.
